Add contact, blog, and colophon pages with refined form styling

This commit introduces three new pages (contact, blog, and colophon) along 
with blog functionality including a reusable BlogCard component and refined 
form styling throughout.

Contact Page (app/contact/page.js):
- Professional contact form with Name, Email, Phone, Subject, and Message fields
- Form fields use consistent spacing (space-y-4 for fields, space-y-2 for label-to-input)
- All labels styled with text-base font-semibold for proper hierarchy
- Inputs are h-10 (40px) with matching px-3 py-2 padding
- Submit button matches input height (h-10) with identical padding structure
- Contact information sidebar with Location, Phone, Email, and Hours
- Reduced spacing between contact info items (space-y-4, mb-1 on headings)
- Privacy and response time information in footer section

Blog System:
- Blog listing page (app/blog/page.js) with category filtering
- Individual blog post page (app/blog/[slug]/page.js) with PortableText rendering
- BlogCard component for consistent post display across listing and homepage
- Sanity CMS schema for blog posts with title, slug, author, excerpt, images, categories, and tags
- Custom PortableText components for rich content rendering (headings, blockquotes, links, code, images)
- Category filter UI with "All Posts" and dynamic category buttons
- Post metadata display with category badges and formatted dates using date-fns

Colophon Page (app/colophon/page.js):
- Comprehensive tech stack documentation (Next.js 16, Sanity CMS, Vercel, Tailwind CSS v4)
- Design system details including typography, font stack, and animation guidelines
- Accessibility statement with WCAG 2.1 Level AA conformance details
- Credits and acknowledgments for open-source technologies used

Layout Updates (app/layout.js):
- Updated navigation to include Articles and Studio links
- Enhanced footer with three-column layout: Company Info, Quick Links, and Information
- Footer links to Contact and Colophon pages

Homepage Updates (app/page.js):
- Latest blog posts section displaying 3 most recent articles
- Integrated BlogCard component for post previews
- "View all articles" link to blog listing page

Dependencies Added:
- @portabletext/react: For rendering Sanity rich text content
- date-fns: For consistent date formatting across blog pages

Design System Consistency:
- All form elements use h-10 (40px) height with px-3 py-2 padding
- Labels are text-base font-semibold across the site
- Button heights match input heights for visual consistency
- Consistent spacing patterns: space-y-4 for major sections, space-y-2 for related items
- Sentence case for all button text ("Send message" not "Send Message")
